name: hugo-sphere-theme
description: Hugo theme for resumes/CV focussed on software developers and engineers

scripts.make:dist: rm -rf dist && npm run make:sass && npm run make:copy && npm run make:clean
scripts.make:copy: cp -r archetypes exampleSite images layouts static README.md LICENSE.md theme.toml dist/ && cp -r assets/print dist/assets/
scripts.make:clean: rm -rf dist/exampleSite/public dist/exampleSite/dist dist/exampleSite/resources && find ./dist/exampleSite -name ".*" -exec rm -rf -- {} +
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:toml
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:html && npm run lint:fix:toml

author: Simon Mang
